price: Nagsabi [si Paraon]: “Tunay na ang sugo ninyo na isinugo sa inyo ay talagang baliw.”
arabic: قَالَ إِنَّ رَسُولَكُمُ ٱلَّذِيٓ أُرۡسِلَ إِلَيۡكُمۡ لَمَجۡنُونٞ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qāla inna rasūlakumu alladhī ur'sila ilaykum lamajnūnun
